meanings.sent1: She foreknowledges the outcome of the game before it even starts.
meanings.sent2: He always foreknowledges the weather forecast before planning any outdoor activities.
meanings.sent3: The psychic foreknowledges the winning lottery numbers every week.
meanings.sent4: The wise old owl seemed to foreknowledges the dangers lurking in the dark forest.
meanings.sent5: The detective's keen intuition foreknowledges the culprit's next move.

meanings.definition: Knowledge of something before it happens.
meanings.sent1: Her foreknowledges of the upcoming surprise party made her excitement hard to contain.
meanings.sent2: The ancient manuscript contained foreknowledges of events that would shape the future.
meanings.sent3: The cat's foreknowledges of the earthquake made it hide under the bed before it even started.
meanings.sent4: The prophet's foreknowledges of the impending disaster saved the village from destruction.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's foreknowledges of the experiment's outcome led to groundbreaking discoveries.
